replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content: {:10_499:}如此简单的一题。你们居然聊到这样= =

replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content: 按照本人来说一个命令解决

replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content:
LZ自己看java -Xms1024M -Xmx1024M -jar mcpc-1.4.6-beta-2.01.jar -o false PAUSE
注意别复制我的进去。首先把你文本内容去掉。然后复制我这个进去。然后自己修改jar文件名字。就OK了

replies.author: Emerson
replies.txt_content: 然后。给分
